data.text: Roho mar Jehova Nyasaye nobi kuome,
kendo enobed mamor gi joma oluoro Jehova Nyasaye.
to gi adiera nongʼad bura ne joma odhier,
Nyathi madhoth notug machiegni gi dho bur thuond rachier,
Odiechiengno Nyakwar Jesse nochungʼ kaka ranyisi ne ji; mi ogendini nobi ire, kendo kare mar yweyo nobed gi duongʼ.
Kindeno Ruoth Nyasaye norie bade kendo koresogo joge mane odongʼ e lwet jo-Asuria, koa Misri mamwalo nyaka mamalo, koa Kush, Elam, Babulon, Hamath to gi chula manie ii nam.
Ginimonj jo-Filistia kagiwuok yo podho chiengʼ,
Jehova Nyasaye nomi nam makwar mar jo-Misri dwon,
Wangʼ yo maduongʼ nobedi ne joge manok
